title: Forget Black Friday - Amazon is having a massive sale on its own devices right now
description: Just ahead of the Black Friday deals event, Amazon is having a huge sale on its own devices, including TVs, tablets, Echo, and more.

title: Yes, AMD has a secret weapon to fight off Nvidia AI armada — no, it has absolutely nothing to do with GPUs and everything to do with HBM
description: The AI arms race is heating up with AMD leaning on innovations by Xilinx and SK Hynix.

title: Google Bard can now respond to your AI queries in real time, like ChatGPT
description: Google has updated the way that Bard responds to your queries, though you can go back to the old way of working.

title: DDoS attacks are getting bigger and more powerful, and that's a really bad thing
description: Since HTTP/2 Rapid Reset was found, DDoS attacks have been getting bigger and more powerful.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 looks likely to launch in January
description: There's now more evidence than ever that the Samsung Galaxy S24 handsets will show up in January 2024.

title: 'SSD Performance levels': New generation of microSD cards could help transfer an entire Blu-ray movie in less than 15 seconds, paving the way for mainstream 8K recording
description: The SD Express Speed Class 600 standard can hit 600Mb/s.
